name: Forfeiture of telecommunication service device and cable television service device
text: Any telecommunication service device, cable television service device, or instructions or plans therefor, or any materials for making or assembling a telecommunication service device possessed or used in violation of sections 708-8200 to 708-8203 may be ordered forfeited to the State for destruction or other disposition, subject to the requirements of chapter 712A. [L 1987, c 268, pt of §2; am L 1989, c 261, §20; am L 1996, c 222, §5]
